import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Flex, Stack, Text, Container, Box, Accordion, Radio, Group, Center, ColorInput, Slider, Input, Divider, } from "@mantine/core"; import { IconCircleXFilled, IconAlignLeft, IconAlignCenter, IconAlignJustified, IconAlignRight, IconAdjustmentsHorizontal, IconBaselineDensityMedium, IconBaselineDensitySmall, } from "@tabler/icons-react"; const Drawer = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState(50); const [endValue, setEndValue] = useState(50); return ( Drawer Icon
Change Icon Background Icon Color Size setValue(e.target.value)} style={{ width: "50px" }} /> onChangeEnd value: {endValue} Weight Back Button Radious Content Padding Content Margin Content ); }; export default Drawer;
